long_description: Get grounded in your postures with these jean-style, body-conforming Shiva capri pants from Lole. From the yoga studio to stepping out with a slinky sweater, they're made to move with you in comfort. A supportive blend of organic cotton, lyocell and elastane offers 4-way stretch, moisture wicking and odor resistance. Medium rise; ruching at knees; lined gusset at crotch; flat seams for comfort; 2 front pockets with satin binding; reflective logo. Rib-knit construction offers high breathability and excellent stretch and recovery. The Lole Shiva capri pants offer a next-to-skin fit and keyhole details at rear cuffs.
